scripts.install:all: npm --prefix apps/api install && npm --prefix apps/web install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm --prefix apps/api run dev" "npm --prefix apps/web run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix apps/web run build && npm --prefix apps/api run build
scripts.check: npm --prefix apps/api run check && npm --prefix apps/web run check
